name: flightdom
description: Æ’lightDom is a super lightweight functional API to work with the DOM.

scripts.prepare: test -d .git && test -x .git && cd .git/hooks/ && curl -O https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Buzut/git-emojis-hook/master/commit-msg && curl -O https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Buzut/git-emojis-hook/master/prepare-commit-msg && chmod +x * || exit 0
scripts.docs: jsdoc -a all -c jsdoc.config.json src -R README.md -d docs

author: Buzut (https://buzut.net)
